activate.ChoosePassPhrase:
Sarudza mutsara wekupfuura kuti upinde nawo.
Mutsara wakajeka unoumbwa nemashoko mashomanana auchayeuka nyore nyore.
activate.ChoosePassPhraseSeeSuggestions: Sarudza mutsara wakanaka wokutumira akaunti yako. Ona mazano kune mamwe mazano.
activate.IfYouFeel: Kana iwe uchinzwa chimwe chinhu chakakanganisika, unogona

authorize.mustAgree: Kutanga iwe unofanirwa kubvumirana kune zvirevo.

notifications.title: Chirevo
notifications.prompt: Unoda here kugonesa maziso? Iwe uchagamuchira zororo-nguva chaiyo pamusoro pezvinhu zvaunofarira.
notifications.CompletedActivationLogIn: Wapedza kuvhurwa kwemushandisi. Edza kupinda mukati izvozvi.

login.title: Mauya
login.resendConfirm: Iwe unoda kutumira meseji yekugadzirisa zvakare pasipoti yako?
login.resendSuccess: Tarisa uwane meseji yekugadzirisa yako paswedi
login.noPassphrase: Usati iwe wagona kupinda mukati, iwe unofanirwa kuseta chirevo chekupfuura nekudzvanya chinongedzo mune yako activation meseji.
login.notVerified: Iwe unofanirwa kuzvitumira iwe meseji yeku activation kuitira kuti ugone kupinda mukati.
login.emailExists: Wati wamboyedza kunyoresa neiyi email here? Kana zvirizvo, tarisa yako inbox kuti ishandise account yako. Dzvanya kuti utumirezve meseji yacho
login.mobileExists: Wakamboedza kunyoresa neiyi nharembozha zvisati zvaitika? Kana zvirizvo, tarisa yako yeSMS yekumisa account yako. Dzvanya kuti utumirezve meseji yacho
login.facebookNoEmail: Yako facebook account iri kushaya yakasimbiswa email kero. Ingo pinda munzira yekuzvarwa.
login.picTooltip: Unogona kuchinja mufananidzo uyu gare gare
